about.title: About Me
paragraphs: A versatile and passionate creator who can handle various aspects of digital media production. Whether it's designing stunning visuals, animating engaging motion graphics.

I have more than 11 years of experience in various fields of design, animation, and web development. I love to craft beautiful and engaging solutions for different kinds of projects, from branding and logo design to motion graphics and interactive websites. I'm always eager to learn new skills and technologies to enhance my creative potential and expand my portfolio. I love to collaborate with clients and partners who share my vision and values.
If you are looking for a creative director, designer, motion designer, or frontend developer, you have come to the right place!

You can also contact me anytime via email or social media.
Thank you for visiting and I hope to hear from you soon!

moreContent.title: More Content
moreContent.text: Adding more content to make the page scrollable and test the behavior of Scroll across different pages.

works.title: My Works
works.intro: Here you can see a selection of my projects. Each of them is a story of collaboration, creativity, and technical skill.

projects.title: A Stroll On The Beach
projects.description: A brief description of Project One, showcasing skills in web development and modern design principles.
projects.fullDescriptionOne:
Target:

Creating a 3D model and poster in the style of cartoons from the Pixar Animation Studios. The personage should be similar in appearance and character to the client's daughter. The main requirements are beach sand, bright lighting, a happy expression, balloons, shells, starfish...


Soft:

Zbrush, Blender, Adobe Photoshop

projects.title: Spheres
projects.description: Creating immersive 360° video content specifically designed for LED media spheres to deliver a fully captivating and dynamic visual experience.
projects.fullDescriptionOne:
Target:

Creating video content on the topic of "natural elements" in 360° (VR) format. This would be a great way to showcase the beauty and diversity of nature, as well as to provide an immersive and educational experience for the viewers.
The project would involve using software such as "Blender", "After Effects" and "Premiere Pro" to create realistic and stunning 3D models and animations of various natural elements, such as water, fire, earth, and air.
The final product would be compatible with VR devices and platforms, such as LED Media-Spheres.


Soft:

Blender, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop
projects.TextParalax:
"..At the entrance of the building, screen balls are placed under the ceiling, which broadcast 360° of environmental content.."

UNK corporate interiors
projects.fullDescriptionTwo:
"...The architects preferred not to continue the idea of green facades in the interior literally - at the expense of living plants. Therefore, the eco-theme is embodied here by figurative means. The project is based on the idea of biomes (biological environments such as, for example, desert, tundra, ocean, etc.). At the entrance of the building, screen balls are placed under the ceiling, which broadcast 360 degrees of environmental content specially created for the project (each ball has its own biome)." - UNK corporate interiors

Full project review - UNK corporate interiors, Officenext
